mfa.enabled_by_admin: Your admin has enabled multifactor authentication for your organization and recommends setting it up.
mfa.enforced_by_admin: Your admin has enforced multifactor authentication for your organization and recommends to setup.
mfa.complete: Complete the following steps to configure MFA for your mobile app.
mfa.install: Install the authenticator app on your phone.
mfa.choose: In the app, choose to add an account and scan the QR code.
mfa.show_secret: Show the secret key for manual configuration.
mfa.type: Type the secret configuration key when prompted by your MFA application.
mfa.once_configured: Once the app is configured, show the six-digit code. Click Next.
mfa.enter_code_to_start: Enter the six-digit code from your multifactor authenticator app and click Next to Start using MFA authentication.
mfa.enter_code_to_change: Enter the six-digit code from your multifactor authenticator app and click Next to change your existing MFA account.
mfa.unsuccessful_operation: The operation was not successful. Try again!
mfa.tries_left: You have {{triesLeft}} tries left. You will be redirected to login page.
mfa.current_password: Enter your current password to verify your account.
